{{also|永安宫}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=永安宫}}

===Etymology===
Literally: Palace of Eternal Peace
: It was here that [[w:Liu Bei|Liu Bei]] met his end. The [[w:Prince of Hongnong|Prince of Hongnong]], along with his consort (Lady Tang) and mother ([[w:Empress He (Ling)|Empress He]]), were all exiled to this palace after [[w:Dong Zhuo|Dong Zhuo]] made [[w:Emperor Xian of Han|Emperor Xian of Han]] the new emperor.
